ygData.subject: Banded Armor Purchase
ygData.msgSnippet: I am trying to advoid spamming list(s) because I know this isn t the place. Plus the other list doesn t seem to have any smiths on Tarew Marr. Looking to buy
ygData.messageBody:
I am trying to advoid spamming list(s) because I know this isn't the place.
Plus the other list doesn't seem to have any smiths on Tarew Marr.

Looking to buy large banded on Tarew Marr. I want to purchase a full set
(but don't need mantle). I currently have only 18 plat but hope to be much
higher by Sunday, and much more by the following Sunday. I currently
running around Freeport / Itthica Swamp zones. Also may have another banded
purchase a few weeks later for another character which would require small
banded. I guess I need to know cost first, then I can e-mail you when I get
the plat up, and make arrangements to meet up sometime/place (prefer
Freeport or Itthica Swamp area) to make the trade.

If anyone can help me you can e-mail me directly to keep the noise down on
the list, or you can make the conversation public in hopes of a few more
sales.

Brek

Oh, if your full suit price is 100plat and you are the only one to respond,
and willing to meet me (once I get the plat) well guess that is what it will
cost me.
